metadata.name: Smokers Pass Share
metadata.description:
Smokers Pass is a Limited supply Of 1/3000 ERC-1155 Shares as a Passive reward utility.
 Smokers Pass will provide the holder one (1) share of the Staked Apecoin pool every month! if you hold several passes will your reward become higher!
- Your Stoner Ape doubles as your Smokers Pass membership ERC-1155 NFT, and grants access to members-only benefits!
 - Access To the Community Stream Revenue share to holders! Passive income of $APE coin.
 - Future areas and perks can be unlocked by the community through Community Voted activation. 
- All secondary sale royalties (10%) will be invested in the $APE coin Pool.
